function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased intensity of balcony use due to pandemic may lead to higher risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of contagious diseases within apartment buildings and urban housing areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to promote hygiene and ventilation in the design and use of balconies.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV disinfection, touchless fixtures, and antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Residents, visitors, and neighbors in apartment buildings and urban housing areas.","Owner":"Architects, designers, property managers, and residents."}]}
